review: Its a great drug, it help me reduce my face pimples or acne.

I used amoxicillin to treat different problems on different occasions throughout many years. It never failed me, always helped, and I didn't have any side effects from it.  The last time I used it however to treat helicobacter pylori,  it gave me serious cramps and diarrhea. And for sure, it was not the other drug I used in conjunction, but amoxicillin, which surprised me to no end, because I never had such reaction to amoxicillin. I looked at the brand - it was Sandoz, that I didn't use before.  Had to switch the brand, in order to accomplish the treatment.  Then there were no problems - it worked as intended.

This medicine was completely okay - I was very scared to use it at first.Ive gotten 1 g twice a day for 1st week along with nexium 40 mg twice a day, and after about 4 days i already felt better. No side effects at all, except from being a bit tired.Don't be scared. It'll be okay.

Well I was told for 20 plus years I was allergic to penicillin, I did get a rash as a child but that doesn't mean I was allergic.  I took the gamble and I seem to be okay. I'm on the 4th day of treatment and I just want this ugly infection gone.  I'm starting to feel a little better.  Good Health to you all.  No side effects

Amoxil (amoxicillin):Sufferd from heart burn and peptic ulcers every day and night for more than 30years. An older Doctor treated the root cause, not the symptom with amoxicillin & Carafate. I haven't used any antacids for more than 5 years now, and have been enjoying all the foods I like, whenever I like. Thank God for old Doctors.
